author: hship
msg: Add a refresh parameter to the Shell component, which allows for easy automatically refreshing pages.

author: hship
msg: Improve exception reporting when an Insert component is unable to format its value.

author: hship
msg: Change the reset component to not wipe out the session, simply force a refresh of all HTML templates and
component specifications.  It now encodes the currency page as well.

author: hship
msg: More changes to the Tutorial, to take advantage of Tapestry's switch-over to Servlet 2.2.

author: hship
msg: Change EnumPropertySelectionModel to require that the ResourceBundle be passed in
(since it can't always resolve the bundle, due to classloader issues).
